topic.title: Example 6—Multiple files in CSV format with header rows

body.p: Creates a readable external table, ext_expenses, using the file protocol. The files are CSV format and have a header row.

p.codeblock: =# CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext_expenses ( name text, date date, amount float4, category text, desc1 text ) LOCATION ('file://filehost/data/international/*', 'file://filehost/data/regional/*', 'file://filehost/data/supplement/*.csv') FORMAT 'CSV' (HEADER);
